answers.answer: I had it with both my boys. Hope everything goes smoothly
How far along are you? Wish you well dear keep us updated!
28 weeks and how did it go with yours sons? ?

Both I ended up induced about a week and a half before their due dates. But I spent a lot of time in and out of hospital getting checked having stress tests ultrasounds blood work had nurses coming to the house all the time and had to see my Dr once a week. Both are perfectly healthy boys now my first was a little scary because I had low fluid as well which is really bad. But I had to do a lot of relaxing and trying not to stress. My first little guy was very sick at birth he ended up having surgery but they sad there was no way to know if that was from the hp. I also had other health issues while pregnant. My second was born perfectly healthy no issues at all.
Ok glad there doin great! Im jus very nervous i have so long til my due date hope they can control it!

I went through it at 16yrs old with my daughter. I had hypertension/high blood pressure and preclampsia, I was in labor for 26hrs before they induced me. I just tried to stay calm, do as my doctor (who was awesome and pregnant with her fourth daughter herself!) said, and it helped they said she wad doing fine the whole time. She turned out great. I'm 16weeks along now, 32yrs old, have hypertension again, and after my daughter I have no doubt a long as I do my best to stay calm and go with the flow we will both be fine. You can do this!
Ok thank you guys so much !!!

I had it with my second I had to be induced because it turned into preeclampsia but he's a healthy 3yr old now no issues. They put me on magnesium and bp meds about amonth after but I was able to breast feed with no issues. Good luck don't worry it's very common
Good to hear i was freaking out!

I had high blood pressure through my whole pregnancy. When in labor and delivery my blood pressure was checked every 10 to 15 minutes. I had one or 2 high ones and that's when they decided to break my water and my baby was coming

question: In labor and delivery with high blood pressure im very scared anyone else goin thru this? ?
title: omg
